summary: This mod adds several of Tokyobleach\'s stories to Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to sit down and read a good book in Skyrim? Well now you can this mod adds all of Tokyobleach\'s stories in book form to Whiterun:

See pics for locations.

ATTENTION
******************************************

I did not write these stories that is the work of tokyobleach, she has given me permission to implement them into the game. You can read her stories at the following
links:

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/530457-a-change-in-management/

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/530386-journal-of-erik-the-slayer/

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/320240-oblivion-yeah-thats-a-pun-%3B/

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/321725-wheres-new-canaan-anyway/

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/320182-intersecting-sagas/

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/339165-an-emotional-day-for-kiyoko-suzuki/

******************************************

Installation:

Just put the .esp in your data folder. Done! (and of course activate in data files or nexus mod manager)

Locations:

Journal of Erik the Slayer -Whiterun- On top of the guard\'s barracks

The Stories of the Wasteland books - In the Bannered Mare - Whiterun
author: Jedijas
